MinesweeperGuide.title: How to Play Minesweeper
MinesweeperGuide.objective: The goal of Minesweeper is to find all the squares without mines without triggering any mines.
MinesweeperGuide.howToPlay: Tap a square to reveal it. If the square is empty, it will automatically reveal adjacent squares. If you reveal a square with a mine, the game ends.
MinesweeperGuide.flagging: If you suspect a square has a mine, long press on it to mark it with a flag. You can remove the flag by long pressing again.
MinesweeperGuide.gameEnd: The game ends when you reveal all the squares without mines or when you trigger a mine. If you complete it without triggering a mine, you win the game!
MinesweeperGuide.trick1: For the 1-1 rule: When the player sees two '1's adjacent at the edge of the minefield, the third square in the line touching from the outside in is the safe square.
MinesweeperGuide.trick2: For the 1-2 rule: When the player sees '2' next to '1' at the edge of the minefield, the third square outside the '2' in the touching line is the square with the bomb.
